But backlash following a gun rally at a Dallas Chipotle this weekend led the chain to take action .

Moms Demand Action for Gun Sense in America , a Michael Bloomberg - backed gun control group , began circulating a petition calling for the company to prohibit guns in its stores on Monday following a gun rally at a Dallas Chipotle this weekend .
